column3: “Herijuana blows me away. If you smoke this, be prepared to not be active.  The batch I purchased doesn't knock me out right away, but it lays the groundwork very well if needed,and insomnia was one of the reasons I wanted to try it.  Surprisingly, it works more as a fairly quick sleep aid if you smoke smaller quantities.  Last night I smoked a large bowl myself and it was a very trippy high.  I was left immobile, and...”

“By far the best strain I have found for my issues. I have chronic back pain, depression and anxiety, and I suffer from stage c2 colon cancer, PTSD and am a recovering heroin addict. This strain is excellent for my appetite, my back pain and my stress, I highly recommend to anybody looking for a medication for appetite stimulation and insomnia in particular.”

“This Strain is the  motherfuckong shit man i smoked 4 bowls from a steamroller omg, leme tell u im stoned as fuck right now so yeah..
i felt a strong buuzz,i feel blown to the dome omg it also gave me the ablility to rap.. i also felt really mello, a full body tingle”

“Best couch lock/sleep strain I've ever had. I have severe insomnia and also take sleeping pills but when I found this strain I flushed them pills down the toilet! I've tried every indica possible and this by far has helped me the most with my insomnia. It's a very potent strain and sometimes I get panic attacks when I smoke. but the CBGA % on most phenos of Herijuana are very high which helps curb the euphoric/physco...”
“In-da-couch pain relief rescue comes on fast then creeeps...midnight tokin' Bliss...calming, soothing, sooo Kind!...I'm doing the Dali-melt...💤💤”

“I would rate this a 4.5 overall. It has great flavor, earthy and pungent! I vape the dry bud and if you do just enough you can be very focused and task oriented and if you do just enough more you'll be totally relaxed and chill. Again the flavor, taste is amazing. Man I could just sniff the bag and be happy, lol!”

“Look, its a bird, its a plane...its a real life superhero flying in to save the day!!  I don't care, I'm busy puffin on the best strain I've come across in a LONG time - maybe, dare I say it, ever!  I'm a bit biased as I am a kush guy at heart, but that fact in and of itself should tell you that I am a picky consumer of the indica.  

Herojuana came to me in large chunky nugs, from the most legit co-op in SoCal.  B...”
“third degree burns on fingers from grabbing a hot plate from the oven... Herojuana killed the pain. A+++”

“By far the best strain for insomnia and appetite stimulation by far. This is my favorite medicine, I make a propane concentrate as well, and it has been most effective in both forms, and both eaten and smoked. Highly recommend to patients seeking sleep aid, and the anti nausea properties are just amazing.”

“I've had Herijuana before, but I bought a new strain of it called Orange Herijuana (Orange Creamsicle x Herijuana). The effects were more uplifted/euphoric than straight Herijuana. I was able to socialize (with friends who smoke) and watch TV/play video games. I also felt creative, and music was just amazing. It was almost like living in a dream world. Very pleasant. It's not as good for sleep/pain as straight Heriju...”
“Jason King wrote about Herijuana back in 2001 in the Cannabible and said most people simply shouldn't smoke it"
column4: which I took as a challange. 14 years on the east coast and never came across it
column5: this being my holy grail strain. I moved to Colorado this year and immediately pursued this
column6: my most sought after of nugs. My room mate works for a dispensery and they had Orange Herijuana
column7: of which I was very unimpressed. B...”"

column3: “🙏💀 Herijuana (Herojuana) from House of Herbs is a solid indica with very strong pain relieving effects. Dense and dark nugs, just slightly frosted over with a nice earthy armoa. I'm not too fond of the name, but this strain packs a mighty punch! I would highly recommend this for those who need help shutting their mind and bodies down after a busy day. All around solid indica.”

“Wow! This is one of the highest thc % content I've ever seen in person at 29.1% 1.8% cbd. A lot of ppl on here lie or wherever they get their flowers from are telling lies bc I frequently read reviews from ppl claiming thc % 30+, on strains that can't even get that high of a %. This is very rare to see a flower with this high thc content. Super heavy hitter , I think I just ate 4 or 5(?) bowls of cereal then passed o...”
“Picked up the Orange Herijuana @ Native Roots. Had nice citrus flavor, mellow buzz, and worked pretty well for relaxing a pinched nerve.”
“again another strong one.  just trash your Hydrocodone, Prozac and your Benzodiazepines.. all those in one sexy green nugg”
“this is the best strain I have ever used for insomnia.  extreme couch lock.  has the flavor of sandalwood spice and pepper.  Effects: 100% body, heavy, narcotic, will turn you to JELLY!”
“this is the best strain I have ever used for insomnia.  extreme couch lock.  has the flavor of sandalwood spice and pepper.  Effects: 100% body, heavy, narcotic, will turn you to JELLY!”

“Herojuana is a strain that is difficult to accurately rate because so many dispensaries have it labeled wrong.  I sampled a batch from a very reputable place and found it to be a very strong indica with a down and out" head and body stone.  It made me slightly self conscious.  I did not find the strain to be Euphoric.  It had an active head high and
column5: this is either a good thing or a bad thing...”"

column3:
“I mainly use cannabis to treat my seizures that are caused by lack of good sleep. Herojuana is simply fantastic. It gives you a nice warm hug before you fall into a nice cozy long sleep. I naturally wake up every morning at 6am and herojuana doesn't make me feel sleepy when I wake up even though this strain has a THC content near 30%. (Ps: I naturally have a low tolerance)

Amazing comfy effect! My favorite H.Indica.”

“I paid a premium price for this strain, $25/g and I bought 2 grams. I have to say I am impressed, just 2 puffs from the pipe and I am extremely relaxed and my eyelids are very heavy. For these effects I would normally have to smoke about 4 bowls of Kush. About 15 seconds after the first hit you are already under the influence of some powerful bud. 

The look is medium green with light green flecks and dark brown ha...”

“I love herijuana, it's a strain that provides ultimate pain relief no matter how much I smoke it.
It's probably one of the best concentrates to have in your medicine box for pain, insomnia, and nausea.
It gets rid of the constant motion sickness I feel, and that's major. Sometimes I am stuck in bed all day because my equilibriums off I feel so nauseous. 
Herijuana is a god send for health problems like psuedoaneurysm...”

“The oz we bought was nice and sticky with the little orange hairs and all that jazz. Smelled as good as bowl of fruit and tasted citrus-y when smoked. I feel so relaxed and creative. I am so excited to be sitting in bed eating a bunch of oranges on tumblr while high #420”
“It's a take in bed flower,  can't stay awake on it.”

“5/5 and my favorite strain yet. I have bought this many times over the past year whenever I can. One of a few that has ever helped me SLEEP. Helps with pain and will definitely calm you down if you feel hyper. Does NOT cause anywhere near the level of head high or paranoia. A few downsides: you only get the full effects if you smoke (not vape) it, you have to smoke a lot of it if you really want it to knock you out, ...”

“WTF just hit me?  Arms are numb from elbows to finger tips. Wife and I vaped, maybe three hits each at 356 degrees. Less than two minutes in and 80% of full impact felt. Both had eye watering laughing spree for about five minutes. Don’t remember what started it but just kept riffing off each other till neither of us could catch our breaths from laughing so hard.  I highly recommend Herijuana and I am not a paid spoke...”

“Got the Orange Herijuana from Native Roots on a recent camping trip in Aspen- I'm in love. Easily one of the best strains I've ever tried, and I've been smoking a long time now. Great citrusy, woodsy sort of aroma and flavor, with an intense body-high, but without the fogginess in the head. I felt clear headed and had plenty of energy, but without feeling anxious. This strain worked wonders for my back pain as well, ...”

“Its not like getting hit by Mayweather, its more like getting hit by Tyson. woof.

@americanmarywa”
“ONE OF MY TOP 5 FAVORITES. VERY POTENT INDICA LOVE THIS STRAIN.  TAKE IT OVER ANY OTTHER ANY DAY. (:”

“A strain I can adore. I was first impressed by the spicy, peppery smell of this flower...one of the most intriguing I've ever enjoyed. This is a strain that separates itself from other mind-numbing indicas by hitting you with an eye opening body sensation that awakens your primal senses. With the right music, this indica can melt your chest and awaken your nervous system. A perfect date companion because focus will b...”

“Covered in tendrils, Herojuana has an earthy flavor with an unusual aftertaste. The nugs are dense, you can flip the bowl no problem. After the first hit, the high takes a little longer than usual to set in. It starts with tingles, and  ends whenever your eyes shut.”

“Something about this HEAVY ass strain doesn't sit well with me. To each his own, maybe it's cause I had no clue how heavy and pure it was so I jumped in too heavy. I broke it up, smelled and looked amazing, I rolled it up and lit it. Taste was very sweet, amazing. Took a few hits and after 10mins I was seeing blinking lights and bright tracers. I smoked the second day and the same effect happened, except this time it...”

“Out of the many strains I have smoked, Herijuana is hands down the finest. This strain's high CBD level is perfect for putting one in a state of relaxation. Lets just say; if a donkey were to kick me in my face, it wouldn't be an issue on Herijuana. This stuff takes the edge off; which is beneficial to me due to my ailments. Some of which are: OCD, IBS, anxiety,and depression.  Thank you Herijuana.”
“Love it! Smoke it all the time : )”

“Out of the many strains I have smoked, Herijuana is hands down the finest. This strain's high CBD level is perfect for putting one in a state of relaxation. Lets just say; if a donkey were to kick me in my face, it wouldn't be an issue on Herijuana. This stuff takes the edge off; which is beneficial to me due to my ailments. Some of which are: OCD, IBS, anxiety,and depression.  Thank you Herijuana.”
“Great Indica to relax, relieve pain or stress from a long day. I smoke Herijuana late at night to help me sleep or after a long day at work. Highly recommend.”

“Second review👍 this is the best strain for sleep and pain by a long shot. It literally numbs your body like a narcotic without the addiction of course. And then I fall into a deep sleep that I don't even remember. I have very bad issues with insomnia and back pain and it does the trick for both. If you can find this in any form I highly suggest you give it a try. And also for people who have panic attacks or get par...”

“Man. THIS STRAIN. I recently went to Denver, Colorado with my husband for our one year anniversary (and the weed) and we had some pre-rolls of this strain, I have never tasted any strain that tastes so good. It literally tastes like a pan of dressing at thanksgiving dinner. Also super good bud overall.”

“One of my top go-tos for endometriosis pain and migraines. Pretty sedating and moderate narcotic effects, so for me it's a better solitary smoke in the evenings with nothing to do besides watch tv and relax.”
“I have YET to find another strain that I love more. This one showed up on the menu at my local dispensary just r”
“I love this strain at night. It is a great sleep aid and it definitely helps with aches and pain. It helps with eating problems also. It has a fruity flavor a nice smooth smoke. Nice strain.”
“Relieved the pain and pressure I get from headaches caused by Bone Tumors growing on my skull next to my brain. Also has helped with the pain from my Fibromyalgia.”

“I am in love with this strain. I have pretty gnarly anxiety, depression and PTSD. It immediately relaxed my entire body and got rid of the constant pit in my stomach. Even my forehead and jaw are relaxed which are my I have to work on consciously to keep from getting a headache. Mentally I felt more focused and was able to have a couple significant breakthroughs helping my depression and PTSD. I felt hopeful and high...”
“I love this strain at night. It is a great sleep aid and it definitely helps with aches and pain. It helps with eating problems also. It has a fruity flavor a nice smooth smoke. Nice strain.”
“Five stars for anti-insomnia action. Within minutes after vaping I was ready to crash.”

“5 star top shelf strain from The Prime Leaf. Potent and very effective for anxiety and stress. A little on the pricey side but well worth it when a nice batch is around. Nugs look and smell great, highly recommended. High tolerance here and only a few rips needed.”

“Firm sticky medium green buds with tons of crystal trichomes & burnt orange hairs. Tasted & smelled of sweet lemon, pine, & mild skunk. Got great physical sedation from this Indica. Strain cultivated by CCC & contained 21% THC. Herijuana AKA Herojuana.”

“Honestly was not a fan of this strain. I got extremely paranoid and very dizzy something like I never felt. Also I thought I was blind for a good 10 minutes cause my vision was so blurry lol! Although this all happened to me it smells so amazing that's why I'm being generous and giving it a 3/5”

“I had this crossed with og, I've smoked herojuana without the og and I think it's an amazing indica . Crossed wîth the og, the tastes didn't match resulting into a harsh thick smoke. The flowers crossed with of were beautiful to look at but that's all it had going for it. Herojuana by itself is rare , super potent , and a great night time smoke. I'd give it 8/10”
“I love this strain at night. It is a great sleep aid and it definitely helps with aches and pain. It helps with eating problems also. It has a fruity flavor a nice smooth smoke. Nice strain.”
“Five stars for anti-insomnia action. Within minutes after vaping I was ready to crash.”

“5 star top shelf strain from The Prime Leaf. Potent and very effective for anxiety and stress. A little on the pricey side but well worth it when a nice batch is around. Nugs look and smell great, highly recommended. High tolerance here and only a few rips needed.”

“Firm sticky medium green buds with tons of crystal trichomes & burnt orange hairs. Tasted & smelled of sweet lemon, pine, & mild skunk. Got great physical sedation from this Indica. Strain cultivated by CCC & contained 21% THC. Herijuana AKA Herojuana.”

“Honestly was not a fan of this strain. I got extremely paranoid and very dizzy something like I never felt. Also I thought I was blind for a good 10 minutes cause my vision was so blurry lol! Although this all happened to me it smells so amazing that's why I'm being generous and giving it a 3/5”

The flowers crossed with of were beautiful to look at but that's all it had going for it. Herojuana by itself is rare , super potent , and a great night time smoke. I'd give it 8/10”

“I'm just beginning to use Medical Marijuana for aches and pains along with a sleep aid.  The smell is incredibly earthy.  The first time I tried it, I took 4 hits from a vape.  I was doing some serious tripping.  Incredible intense numbness and became very anxious.  I could not sleep for 2-3 hours. Backed off to 3 hits, not as intense but still a bit anxious and tired but unable to sleep. 1-2 hits and I can sleep, bu...”
“Very potent. Pain lifts away and smiles set in. Happiness and good feelings all around.Tingly and warm fuzzy feelings. Pretty strain. Very relaxing and calming. Vape for this strains full flavor.”
“Superrr tasty!! Leafy Rocks.”

“Honestly was not a fan of this strain. I got extremely paranoid and very dizzy something like I never felt. Also I thought I was blind for a good 10 minutes cause my vision was so blurry lol! Although this all happened to me it smells so amazing that's why I'm being generous and giving it a 3/5”
“I love this strain at night. It is a great sleep aid and it definitely helps with aches and pain. It helps with eating problems also. It has a fruity flavor a nice smooth smoke. Nice strain.”
“slow onset for me. Not sedatting at first but if used at night before relaxing it'll surely put you out.”
“Wonderful strain. Perfect for night time and a great pain reliever.”
“Great for insomnia, will put you to sleep in under an hour!”
“Say goodnight! Awesome strain”

“Dreams.. that meant I slept all stages. Great for sleep if you need 8 to 12 hours. My replacement for zquil over counter junk. Will get this as my fibro pain was gone also. I did not awake with numb hands from carpel tunnel ..Slept through pain.”
“perfect for insomnia and the nitecap to kiss tossing and turning to the curb. I”

“This is a long overdue review, and I have written this a while ago but forgot to submit it to Leafly. I doubt iMedz still has this on their menu at the time of this submission (8.5.2014)

I was lucky enough to find this in concentrate form, and I've also had the flower before. The effects and aromas are comparably identical. I sometimes refer to this as the lead-band"
column4: because I had the feeling of immense weight on ...”"

“Great indica, very happy with this strain. It's in my top five and I'm a pretty picky smoker. Hope it gets restocked again soon. It's a must try. Very relaxing!”

“probably the heaviest indica i have ever smoked.  I was stuck and relaxed and happy.  I smoked quite a bit throughout the evening through an 18 inch single perc bong, and i was a happy camper fer sher.”

“Dreams.. that meant I slept all stages. Great for sleep if you need 8 to 12 hours. My replacement for zquil over counter junk. Will get this as my fibro pain was gone also. I did not awake with numb hands from carpel tunnel ..Slept through pain.”

“I've been looking forward to reviewing this strain simply because I've heard nothing but great things and by nature I am an indica fanboy. This one delivered, yesterday was international go skateboarding day, was up skating from four o'clock a.m until sunset & boy was I ready to end the day with Herijuana. Rolled within in a raw cone, the effects arrived almost immediately. I could no longer feel the soreness through...”

The buds I got in this batch are all pretty small, none bigger than a quarter in size but they're all dense as hell. The buds themselves are mostly triangular shaped with wild little spurts coming out every which way (not a uniform or very pretty look), colorwise they're dark green with tight orange...”

nice relaxed Indica high 
calming . very beautiful looking bud . gorgeous nugs. strong 4 star”

“82+%. Super nice very relaxed high. Grinning from ear to ear.”

“Herijuana is life!!! Whatever you believe in be it science, a higher power or a goat named Fred Thank it for this wonderful medicine! 
It relieves my severe muscle pain w a nice tingly body feeling. It gives me the euphoric feeling I had heard so much about but as a new med patient had a hard time finding. I feel happy and like I can handle life. 
It does give me a glassy, red, heavy lidded eye look, so probably not ...”

“Probably one of the best indica strains I have had. Be warned though, I would recommend using this strain at night because it will knock you out. The strain is very good for a nights sleep, or if you'd like to just be completely chill. The taste is great and aroma is delightful. Dry mouth is immediately with this one so have a drink ready. Take a seat, take a hit, relax and let your eyes become heavy with this great ...”
“Great product. Mixing Indica with sativa works best for my pain level.”

“Fantastic find from a private grower out here in San Diego ca.  The genetics were on point.  Earthy scent and taste, like fresh soil.  Having rapid cycle bi-polar the same strain can have highly different effects depending how I am cycling.  Anyhow Indica's will often give me anxiety(let alone sleep), more so than not.  Herojuana is an exception.  I was able to medicate anytime on this and never had any anxiety or ot...”

“I'm just starting on my second bowl of Purple Herojuana, and all I can say is DAMN! Got this amazing strain at Sespe Creek Collective (20$/g) and its worth every penny!!! The smell when the bag is opened is definitely strong and almost fruity mixed with cheesy. Not at all unpleasant. The inhale at first may be hard to hold, but after a few rips, it's as easy to hold in as a single breath. Although I am using a Da Bud...”

“One of a handful of strains i Regularly see  the THC lvl in the 27/30% range . Trust and believe anything over 25% is done by a veteran grower. Recently I've read quite a few reviews claiming that they had a blue dream - that tested 30+% and they know this bc were told by someone else. I think a lot of ppl are vaping now and confuse a co2 cartridge (which if made Rht can range from 80-95% depending on several factors...”

“Holy crap this is an awesome strain! I have rheumatoid arthritis and fibromyalgia. Needless to say, I hurt a lot and have some serious insomnia issues. This strain knocks away the pain and allows me to sleep through my husband waking up for work (he tends to forget how to be quiet between the hours of four and seven am). It's also relieved some nausea too!”

The inhale at first may be hard to hold, but after a few rips, it's as easy to hold in as a single breath. Although I am using a Da Bud...”

“my favorite!!!! i love the taste and the effects help me to relax. Dont smoke in the a.m if u got things to do!”

“Holy crap this is an awesome strain! I have rheumatoid arthritis and fibromyalgia. Needless to say, I hurt a lot and have some serious insomnia issues. This strain knocks away the pain and allows me to sleep through my husband waking up for work (he tends to forget how to be quiet between the hours of four and seven am). It's also relieved some nausea too!”
“Perfect indica for a great nights sleep and no groggy, lazy feeling the next day. My favorite de-stesser after a long days work.”

“taste like banana nut bread. very nice fall flavor / fall bud . pumpkin spice tad bit. Taste woody/piney , nutty yet a tad of sweet undertones 
nice relaxed Indica high 
calming . very beautiful looking bud . gorgeous nugs. strong 4 star”
“perfect for insomnia and the nitecap to kiss tossing and turning to the curb. I”
“Absolutely the best for insomnia, hands down.. 🎶🙃😍😊.. Definitely a happy just rock you to bed strain. I recommend this one when The opportunity rises. 🎶🎶 also music is therapeutic 🎶🎶”

“I'm just starting on my second bowl of Purple Herojuana, and all I can say is DAMN! Got this amazing strain at Sespe Creek Collective (20$/g) and its worth every penny!!! The smell when the bag is opened is definitely strong and almost fruity mixed with cheesy. Not at all unpleasant. The inhale at first may be hard to hold, but after a few rips, it's as easy to hold in as a single breath. Although I am using a Da Bud...”

“taste like banana nut bread. very nice fall flavor / fall bud . pumpkin spice tad bit. Taste woody/piney , nutty yet a tad of sweet undertones 
nice relaxed Indica high 
calming . very beautiful looking bud . gorgeous nugs. strong 4 star”
“first batch I got was amazing! second was super dry and didn't have same thc content. overall I was going to give a 5 but it slipped to a 4 because of last batch”

“Very good strain. The head high is very unfocused, and really makes you notice things in your surroundings, and the body high is very mellow, slightly tingly. A good amount of couch lock and a very dry mouth come along for the ride.”
“perfect for insomnia and the nitecap to kiss tossing and turning to the curb. I”
“Great indica, very happy with this strain. It's in my top five and I'm a pretty picky smoker. Hope it gets restocked again soon. It's a must try. Very relaxing!”
“my favorite!!!! i love the taste and the effects help me to relax. Dont smoke in the a.m if u got things to do!”
“Perfect indica for a great nights sleep and no groggy, lazy feeling the next day. My favorite de-stesser after a long days work.”

“Fantastic find from a private grower out here in San Diego ca.  The genetics were on point.  Earthy scent and taste, like fresh soil.  Having rapid cycle bi-polar the same strain can have highly different effects depending how I am cycling.  Anyhow Indica's will often give me anxiety(let alone sleep), more so than not.  Herojuana is an exception.  I was able to medicate anytime on this and never had any anxiety or ot...”

“Very good strain. The head high is very unfocused, and really makes you notice things in your surroundings, and the body high is very mellow, slightly tingly. A good amount of couch lock and a very dry mouth come along for the ride.”
“first batch I got was amazing! second was super dry and didn't have same thc content. overall I was going to give a 5 but it slipped to a 4 because of last batch”
“This and grandaddy purple are my go to indica strains. heriuana has a mystical effect on the body that is not overwhelming but significant. good for body pains, insomnia, anxiety etc. love this”

“-3RD DEGREE BLACK BELT BUD- I fear i will never expierience bud this good ever again. Thats how good it was. 1st EVER 3rd degree Black Belt Buds! This she-ite is no joke. one hit- quit... for $100 a half ounce!!!!!”
“Great euphoric feeling ! Great to relax .. Nice taste”
“This one puts a smile on my face every time. My friend noticed how giddy I was acting as soon as he came over. A fun strain.”

“One of my favorite flowers. I received a tube of shake, enjoyed it so much and even found a prize....there was a seed in the tube!!! YEA..Thanks!!!! It not only took care of my pain that is in my neck, lower back but kept my migraines away and kept me relaxed enough that I could actually sleep with no pain or anxiety!!!”
“Super dense buds, great taste. Hard hitting indica for sure. Great if you wanna relax.”

“Sativa girrrl says: speedball to the max!  Green CRACK, HEROIjuana blend. In a portable j. Out for a date, and what fun! The blend, the potency, the Cheshire cat grins. Good times kids. “Nice indica for calming down or sleeping”

“Decent. Wasn't as strong for me as I hoped it would be”
“St8 indica”

“It's definitely an Indica, body is kind of numb, good for pain, and cramps. It's great for post workout recovery. On the other hand, there is some sativa feelings in the high, I felt uplifted, and happy too.”

“Its love at first inhale. This is by far one of the best strains I've tried in a long time, its intense aroma hints at its intense high however the smooth taste and even smoother ride is pleasantly surprising. this body and mind numbing Indica is one I cant wait to get my hands on again.”

“This is an all round great strain to treat pain, relax and facilitate sleep. It tastes a bit weird but the effects make up for it. Not an easy strain to come by but if it's available I would recommend trying it :o)”

“Nice for sleeping”

Then you roll over me, like a gentle warm wave in the most beautiful of oceans. Then you take me to the softest of easy chairs, where I curl up in a warm ball and drift in and out of sleep.

“Not much to say about this one... Just overall a good strain!”
“Intense high. Not passed out indica intense but heavy heady high. Nice if you're trying to zone. Beautiful buds and crystals that made it look like it was rolled on sugar. Magazine posted quality.”

“This is a hard strain to review.  If I smoke this, I'm seconds away from having an unbearable desire to go to bed.  For me this is a good thing because of my difficulties sleeping, but for others, who knows what they will think.  I can't say how long it lasts because I never lasted more than an hour.

column3: “This is a great strain and is extremely helpful with my lower back pain. I recommend this to anybody who is experiencing any pain.”

“Awesome bud, was well grown, amber trichomes were present. dispensary grade. I favor the calming bud of herojuana. very head heavy body stone. tingly sensation real relaxed focus. and last but not least sleepy. I liked this indica strain. Not sure of its real genetic background.”
“Great night time smoke, love it in the volcano”

“Nice light green sticky flower with a crisp pine flavor, very pleasant to smoke. This is a great strain for pain relief, has a bit of a numbing, body high effect. Made it through a movie, but then slept very well, so might be a creeper. I really enjoyed every part of Herijuana.”

“The sweet aroma and taste alone is worth a burn off this highly potent indica. Most definitely a deep, chill and medicating high. However after 3 bowls, I'm not feeling the sleep inducing punch I was hoping for. Don't get me wrong, it will most def help. I guess I was over expecting?”

“Great strain. Really peaceful effects and potent, a little goes a long way.
Really frosty buds and although its a little on the pricey side a nicely cured nug is worth the extra cash. Helps with anxiety and pain relief.”

“Nice strain!  Feels like the weed of the 1970's.  Mellow, but didn't couch lock me.  I just had an incredible sense of well-being and relaxation.  Helped with my back and neck pain.  Very smooth, tasty smoke, doesn't trigger my asthma.  No paranoia, or nausea, either.  Try it, you'll like it!”

“if you see this strain, and have physical pain- buy it.
it totally numbs the limbs, totally relaxes the joints,
and are clear headed to do stuff.

i have done many ,many indicas- this one is amazing.”

My eyes got nice and warm, and I felt a light and comfortable pressure around my head. A must try for pain or sleep issues.”
“this was a latent feeler, meaning it takes a while to feel the effects. made homemade pasta and sauce, 2 sauces and it took way longer than it should have, but it was so freaking good.”

I wouldn't recommend if you want to be productive, but if you really need that ticket to sleep land and relaxationville, this is the product for you.

column5: no couch lock here. All in all

column3: “Really nice strain for relaxation. Goes extremely well with Zen music”

I have a super high tolly and the herojuana always gets the job done and allo...”
“Great Ninja" strain.

column2: it does not smell as harsh.”"

column3: “These nugs were dark green with dark orange hairs and a pungent, skunky-earthy scent. Smoke wasn't too harsh. Gets the job done. The buzz was powerfully numbing, full-body relaxation.”
“SLEEPY RELAXING SUPER NICE”

“OMG I love this strain. Only got a gram because it was my first time getting it because they were out of my usual, and oh my God it's amazing. Gonna go back for more soon. Total relaxation of both the mind and body. Pain totally gone, relaxed enough to go to work now. Stress gone. Able to function ok.”

“I asked my budtender for something that would knock me out at night... he did not disappoint! I tried it this afternoon as I was off work 😃 It gave me the giggles at first, a bit of double vision and quite a bit of pain relief as I was lulled to sleep by this fabulous flower. Wow is what I say!”
“I took three hits and I got a good buzzy head high, perfect for helping the first few hours of my mundane office job fly by. I'm trying it out for insomnia tonight. Here's hoping!”

“I like it very much. Indica's usually aren't my favorite but this is great. I think it's kinda harsh, but in a good way. Kind of peppery too. Great strain though.”
“Really enjoy when this comes into stock. Long lasting. Nice fruity flavor and smell. Nice kief amount if you grind.”

“Not a favorite due to the earthy/dirty mouth taste after smoking a bowl.  I highly recommend that you roll this up in a flavored paper to make the best of this strain. Anyway, besides the taste, I don't get the same hype about this strain that everyone throws at it.  To me, this is a mid-level OG that needs better flavor and maybe some hash or wax to get it to top shelf level.”
“Great strain while chillin at home. great way to fall asleep.”
“awesome strain always does the job regardless of what's wrong”
“key notes of this strain: i felt howula high”
“Don't let the look fool you, hits you hard”
“It made very sleepy and took away my pain”
“I LUV IT💕💕💕 free from pain and stress”

column4: or recreational" smokers. Hard-core stoners and medical patients will love this very sedative effect and the pain killing aspects of this strain.”"

column3: “I'm currently smoking this strain and This would have to be top5 of my LIST.”

“Very Narcotic like and very sedating. Nice to relax with after anhard days work, kick off your shoes, lay down and smoke some of this and the days pain and anxiety are gone in afew puffs. Great Night Time Indica Med.”

“Very smooth hits hard”

“~1st Degree BLACK BELT BUD~ Definitely Herojuana but not manicured and not quite as potent. But, The herojuana smell and taste were there. Once I saw ans smelt the bud I knew that it was before I was told. I love the taste of this stuff. Disappointed it wasn't a one-hit-quit like that last stuff!”
“This strain helped me and everyone I liked enough to share it with. It is potent and worthy of space in your vaporizer and garden.”
“Picked this up while visiting in Cali. Loved the shallowness and delicious scent! Also helped with with my lower back pain significantly”
“pretty danky. great medication  to just  chill and  relax with and does have  some pain killer effects...alltho not my top choice of indicas but still a great medicine”

“super nervous with this strain not the best taste but it gets you medicated  .”
“A wonderful strain for relaxing and getting good sleep.  It also gives me strong munchies.”
“it's a fine pic this season dont you think?  Eyes are a bit dry. I have zero pain anywhere at all. Tingly. Euphoric. I feel like im floating. No signs of headaches🤗”

“Tamed and somewhat controlled & stoned. Makes me feel  doped so i can dismiss the misery in mind & body. Only thing iz...I can't figure out why the dispensary sold me a dirty syringe w/o a needle .??..Duh”
